relation: Yercaud has fairly mild weather in January. Hills are covered in mist. It is one of the best months for visiting this charming hill station. Days with beautiful sunshine are pleasing while nights can be cool. It is a great time for enjoying vacation and honeymoon trip.
This month offer pleasant and mild climate making it suitable for all kinds of tourist activities. Tourists can indulge in sightseeing tour in and around the city.

Beginning of the summer season offering quite pleasant climate. Temperatures ranges within the comfort zone making it favorable for tourism. It is a great month for enjoying holidays. Indulge in sighting various attractions including lakes and scenic points in Yercaud. It is also suitable for carrying out adventure activities like trekking.

Summer months has moderately hot climate. Days offer beautiful sunshine and the climate is good for tourist visits. Nights during summer have comparatively cool climate with breezes. Visitors can enjoy sightseeing and take up activities like boating.

Weather during May is mild hot with lots of sunshine. Days are bit humid but the temperature lies within the comfort zone. It is ideal for exploring the city. Summer festival is held in this month. It is a seven-day festival with flower shows, dog shows, boating races and village fair.

Summer season continues offering not too hot climate. The weather is still comfortable for taking up tourist visit to the hill station. Nights are relatively cooler due to cool winds. This month is still enjoyable for sightseeing and outdoor activities.

Monsoon season starts from this month accompanying medium to high rainfall in the city. Temperature drop down due to rain but the humidity level increases. It may not be the best time for visit but the hill station becomes very scenic and beautiful in rains. Good time for nature enthusiast. Moreover, the holiday packages prices are comparatively lower during monsoons.

August brings heavy rainfall making it the wettest month of the year. Due to rain, the atmospheric temperature comes down while the humidity level increases. It may not be a good idea to take up tourist visit during rainy season. But the hill station looks very attractive with lush greenery all around. Nature lovers can enjoy the serene beauty and waterfalls during monsoon. Carrying proper rain wear is recommended.

Monsoon season continues and the hill station receives quite high rainfall with strong winds. Temperature drops down while the level of humidity rises. The climate is comfortable and place becomes truly alive with picturesque and green surroundings. Nature enthusiast can enjoy the scenic sights of the place.

Rain starts to diminish in this month. The climate becomes pleasing with good amount of sunshine. It is one of the most favorable months for taking up Yercaud tour packages from Chennai and enjoy a great holiday with family and loved ones. Good month for sightseeing, outdoor trips and adventure activities.

Winter starts in this month bringing in mild cold weather. Days are pleasant with beautiful sunshine. Nights are relatively cold with soft cold breezes. It is the most suitable month for tourism in Yercaud. One can enjoy visiting various tourist places like Big Lake and Botanical Garden. It is also enjoyable time for adventure activities as well.

This month offers mild cold weather with pleasant days and comfortably cold nights. It is a good for visiting Yercaud. With hills covered in mist, it is one of the best months for holidaying and honeymoon trips in Yercaud.
